title: DROWN Attack

profile.name: ownCloud
profile.about: ownCloud GmbH is the company behind the ownCloud Project - the most downloaded open source project for data and file sync, share and view.

vulnerability_information:
Hi,

I want to report a drown attack in *.owncloud.com.

A cross-protocol attack was discovered that could lead to decryption of TLS
sessions by using a server supporting SSLv2 and EXPORT cipher suites as a
Bleichenbacher RSA padding oracle.  Note that traffic between clients and
non-vulnerable servers can be decrypted provided another server supporting
SSLv2 and EXPORT ciphers (even with a different protocol such as SMTP, IMAP or
POP) shares the RSA keys of the non-vulnerable server. This vulnerability is
known as DROWN (CVE-2016-0800).

You can check here: https://test.drownattack.com/?site=owncloud.com
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi,

I want to report a drown attack in *.owncloud.com.

A cross-protocol attack was discovered that could lead to decryption of TLS
sessions by using a server supporting SSLv2 and EXPORT cipher suites as a
Bleichenbacher RSA padding oracle. Note that traffic between clients and
non-vulnerable servers can be decrypted provided another server supporting
SSLv2 and EXPORT ciphers (even with a different protocol such as SMTP, IMAP or
POP) shares the RSA keys of the non-vulnerable server. This vulnerability is
known as DROWN (CVE-2016-0800).

You can check here: https://test.drownattack.com/?site=owncloud.com

activities.message:
Thanks a lot for reporting this potential issue back to us. We take security very seriously and would appreciate if you would not share any information about this bug until we have determined a potential patch.
 
Our security team will take a look at this issue as soon as possible. We will reply to your report within 72 hours, usually much faster.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks a lot for reporting this potential issue back to us. We take security very seriously and would appreciate if you would not share any information about this bug until we have determined a potential patch.

Our security team will take a look at this issue as soon as possible. We will reply to your report within 72 hours, usually much faster.

activities.message: Thanks a lot. We're aware of this and will address this issue as soon as possible. Since you're the first external reporter I'll mark this as the authoritative ticket.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks a lot. We're aware of this and will address this issue as soon as possible. Since you're the first external reporter I'll mark this as the authoritative ticket.

activities.message:
Thanks a lot for your report. We have meanwhile fixed this issue on the affected hosts, the patch has been verified using https://github.com/nimia/public_drown_scanner.

```
root@coverage-owncloud-org:~/public_drown_scanner# python scanner.py 50.30.32.90 443
Testing 50.30.32.90 on port 443

###[ SSL/TLS ]###
  \records   \
50.30.32.90: Case 3d; Server hello did not contain server hello
50.30.32.90: Server is NOT vulnerable with cipher RC2_128_CBC_EXPORT40_WITH_MD5, Message: 3d: no tls


###[ SSL/TLS ]###
  \records   \
50.30.32.90: Case 3d; Server hello did not contain server hello
50.30.32.90: Server is NOT vulnerable with cipher RC4_128_EXPORT40_WITH_MD5, Message: 3d: no tls


###[ SSL/TLS ]###
  \records   \
50.30.32.90: Case 3d; Server hello did not contain server hello
50.30.32.90: Server is NOT vulnerable with cipher RC4_128_WITH_MD5, Message: 3d: no tls


###[ SSL/TLS ]###
  \records   \
50.30.32.90: Case 3d; Server hello did not contain server hello
50.30.32.90: Server is NOT vulnerable with cipher DES_64_CBC_WITH_MD5, Message: 3d: no tls
```

```
root@coverage-owncloud-org:~/public_drown_scanner# python scanner.py 74.208.250.222 443
Testing 74.208.250.222 on port 443

###[ SSL/TLS ]###
  \records   \
74.208.250.222: Case 3d; Server hello did not contain server hello
74.208.250.222: Server is NOT vulnerable with cipher RC2_128_CBC_EXPORT40_WITH_MD5, Message: 3d: no tls


###[ SSL/TLS ]###
  \records   \
74.208.250.222: Case 3d; Server hello did not contain server hello
74.208.250.222: Server is NOT vulnerable with cipher RC4_128_EXPORT40_WITH_MD5, Message: 3d: no tls


###[ SSL/TLS ]###
  \records   \
74.208.250.222: Case 3d; Server hello did not contain server hello
74.208.250.222: Server is NOT vulnerable with cipher RC4_128_WITH_MD5, Message: 3d: no tls


###[ SSL/TLS ]###
  \records   \
74.208.250.222: Case 3d; Server hello did not contain server hello
74.208.250.222: Server is NOT vulnerable with cipher DES_64_CBC_WITH_MD5, Message: 3d: no tls
```

Please note that https://test.drownattack.com uses data collected during February 2016 and thus does not immediately update as servers patch.

activities.message: Our infrastructure is at the moment excluded from our bounties as described in our program description.
